definition[0]: someone who moves very slowly and does not seem to be thinking about what they are doing, especially because they are very tired
example[0]: I walked around like a zombie for most of the day.
definition[1]: a dead person whose body is made to move by magic, according to some African and Caribbean religions
definition[2]: a computer that someone has secretly gained control of and uses to do things such as send spam (=unwanted emails sent to a large number of people)
